meanings.definition: A type of Italian cured meat.
meanings.sent1: I tried some delicious capicolla at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The deli always has fresh capicolla for sale.
meanings.sent3: The capicolla was so tasty, it made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the capicolla filled the room, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to a perfect dish was the high-quality capicolla.

meanings.sent1: For lunch, I ordered a mouthwatering capicolla sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The local cafe's specialty is their famous capicolla sandwich.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my capicolla sandwich, and the dog happily ate it.
meanings.sent4: The capicolla sandwich was a flavor explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The capicolla sandwich was so good, I wanted to eat it every day.
